data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Clarendon, Jamaica.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Clarendon, Jamaica
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Clarendon, Jamaica.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.section_summary: On average, 12 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Clarendon, Jamaica.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Clarendon, Jamaica.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Clarendon, Jamaica to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Lionel Town
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Lionel Town, Clarendon, Jamaica.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Clarendon, Jamaica to the gospel today.
Father, help the 81,574 believers in Clarendon to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Clarendon to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Clarendon
location.cities_list: May Pen, Hayes, Lionel Town, Chapelton, Rocky Point
location.cities_list_w_pop: May Pen (44,755), Hayes (9,701), Lionel Town (5,362), Chapelton (4,514), Rocky Point (3,152)
